name: Delirium: Bad Trip Edition
description:
HISTORY

After a rock n roll show, you wake up in a very dirty bathroom and need to survive the mutant slugs of space are abducting humans. this game is based on the old Survival Horror games like: The Suffering, Resident Evil, Silent Hill.

FEATURES

  • A Deep Web game.
  • Horror and scares.
  • Game in first and third person.
  • Horror game in 3d shooter style.
  • Very interesting levels.
  • Shoot in humans abducted by the mutant slugs of space.
  • A rare and ancient game that fate made see the light of day.
  • Although interesting and fun is a fast adventure.

CURIOSITY ABOUT THE GAME

Well, this was the first game I programmed in blender, I made this game in 2008, in January 2018 I found this game in an old Hd and I decided to share this rarity with you, thank you, friends.
